content.question: The tensions reflected in the passage were most directly the result of which of the following developments?

choices.label: The split between Eastern and Western Europe at the onset of the Cold War
The growth of the European economy as a result of the “economic miracle”
The all-out commitment to defeat Nazi Germany during the Second World War
The growth of anticolonial decolonization movements after the Second World War

content.answer: The split between Eastern and Western Europe at the onset of the Cold War

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
